/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Mauro A. León Payano
Fecha: 2/5/2023*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse;
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sdd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-01T00:52:56Z&st=2023-05-02T16:52:56Z&spr=https&sig=GTErHgUBauQCtX9hCgkz%2FWVqmqfYFldHpyvOu8kN3pA%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsuptfakcdevea5.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
);
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/m_geo1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_geo(
    Estimacion nvarchar(250),
    Estatus nvarchar(250),
    NombredeEstructura nvarchar(250),
    FullYearBudget FLOAT,
    BudgetYTDApril FLOAT,
    ActualYTDApril FLOAT,
    Detalle nvarchar(250),
    Observacion nvarchar(250),
    actualvsfullyear FLOAT,
    actualvsbudget FLOAT
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/m_geo1.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
select top(10) * from master_party.dim_geo

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_geo 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/tf/bi_geo/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * from master_party.dim_geo;

SELECT * from business_knowa.bi_geo;
